channel.title: How do i change the key to open the admin console?
channel.description: If you are moderator or player on a 562 you must type :: to enter a command. But if you are admin, you must hit the reverse aphosrophe key (`) to open a command console. If you are admin, you can't use ::. The reverse aphostrope is usually located near esc, but only on english qwerty keyboards. The problem is, i have a dutch azerty keyboard and there is no reverse aphostrope on that keyboard. How do i change the key to open the console into something else? In what folder do i have to look in? Is it in the client or in my server? plz help me. I am sorry for the spelling errors.

item.title: How do i change the key to open the admin console?
item.dc:creator: @ultraking_x2 ultraking x2
item.description:
@ultraking_x2 wrote:

lol, yes i am dutch

Ja bedankt, ik wist niet dat die toets zou werken

translation: yes, thanks, i didn’t know that that key would work

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the key to open the admin console?

item.title: How do i change the key to open the admin console?

kijk : je ziet f7 -> daaronder staat toch zo’n 6 , druk daar gwn op en het werkt
[/quote]
English please[/quote]oh soz, i tought i could say it in dutch , because he is dutch also ? .

item.title: How do i change the key to open the admin console?
item.dc:creator: @ultraking_x2 ultraking x2
item.description:
@ultraking_x2 wrote:

If you are moderator or player on a 562 you must type :: to enter a command. But if you are admin, you must hit the reverse aphosrophe key (`) to open a command console. If you are admin, you can’t use ::. The reverse aphostrope is usually located near esc, but only on english qwerty keyboards. The problem is, i have a dutch azerty keyboard and there is no reverse aphostrope on that keyboard. How do i change the key to open the console into something else? In what folder do i have to look in? Is it in the client or in my server? plz help me.
I am sorry for the spelling errors.
